channel.title: How to add syi protection or a connection filter
channel.description: Well i have made my self i decent server off a empty base i really would like to get online in about 1 hour while my friend was testin it he said the server is great but it can be syied i thought crap i dont know how to do that so can someone tell me plz try to hurry!
